title: Terrorist Attack in Pahalgam, Kashmir
description: A deadly attack in Pahalgam resulted in 26 tourist fatalities, escalating India-Pakistan tensions.

title: India Suspends Indus Waters Treaty
description: Following the Pahalgam attack, India suspended the Indus Waters Treaty, prompting strong reactions from Pakistan.

title: Apple Shifts iPhone Production to India
description: Apple plans to relocate all iPhone manufacturing for the U.S. market to India by 2026.

title: Heatwave Grips Northern India
description: Temperatures soared above 46Â°C in parts of Rajasthan, causing health concerns and agricultural disruptions.

title: Economic Growth Forecast Downgraded
description: India's GDP growth forecast reduced to 6.3% due to U.S. tariffs and weak private investment.

title: Pakistan Closes Airspace to Indian Flights
description: In response to diplomatic tensions, Pakistan closed its airspace to Indian aircraft.

title: BSF Soldier Detained by Pakistan
description: A BSF jawan was detained after inadvertently crossing the international border into Pakistan.

title: U.S. Issues Travel Advisory for Jammu and Kashmir
description: The U.S. State Department issued a Level 4 'Do Not Travel' advisory for Jammu and Kashmir.

title: India Expels Pakistani Diplomats
description: India expelled Pakistani diplomats following the Pahalgam attack, further straining bilateral relations.

title: Pakistan Suspends Trade with India
description: Pakistan halted all trade with India, including through third countries, amid escalating tensions.

title: South Asian Athletics Championships Postponed
description: The South Asian Athletics Championships were postponed due to regional diplomatic crises.

title: Iran Offers to Mediate India-Pakistan Dispute
description: Iran proposed to mediate between India and Pakistan to de-escalate post-Pahalgam attack tensions.

title: Protests Outside Indian High Commission in Islamabad
description: Protesters attempted to breach the Indian High Commission in Islamabad amid rising tensions.

title: India's Army Chief Visits Kashmir
description: India's Army Chief visited Kashmir to assess security following the Pahalgam attack.

title: Pakistan Suspends Simla Agreement
description: Pakistan suspended the Simla Agreement in response to India's diplomatic actions.

title: Power Outages Amid Heatwave
description: Extended power outages reported in multiple regions due to increased demand during the heatwave.

title: Agricultural Disruptions in Bihar
description: Severe weather events in Bihar led to crop damage and fatalities.

title: India Suspends Visa Services for Pakistani Nationals
description: India halted visa services for Pakistani nationals following the Pahalgam attack.

title: Pakistan Expels Indian Diplomats
description: Pakistan expelled Indian diplomats amid escalating diplomatic tensions.

title: UN Urges Restraint Between India and Pakistan
description: The United Nations called for maximum restraint following the Pahalgam attack.

title: Illegal Fireworks Factory Explosion in Gujarat
description: An explosion at an illegal fireworks factory in Deesa, Gujarat, resulted in 21 fatalities.

title: Train Collision in Jharkhand
description: Two goods trains collided near Sahebganj, Jharkhand, causing two deaths and four injuries.

title: Murshidabad Violence Over Waqf Act
description: Protests against the Waqf (Amendment) Act in Murshidabad, West Bengal, turned violent, leading to three deaths and over 274 arrests.

title: Building Collapse in New Delhi
description: A residential building collapsed in New Delhi, killing 11 people.

title: Extradition of 26/11 Accused Tahawwur Rana
description: Tahawwur Hussain Rana, accused in the 26/11 attacks, was extradited from the U.S. and arrived in Delhi.

title: Pope Francis Passes Away at 88
description: Pope Francis died at the age of 88, prompting a three-day state mourning period in India.

title: Maha Kumbh 2025 Preparations
description: The Uttar Pradesh government signed an MoU to arrange 5,000 special accommodations for Maha Kumbh 2025 attendees.

title: IndiGo's Grounded Aircraft Reduction Plan
description: IndiGo announced plans to reduce its number of grounded aircraft to mid-40s by April 2025 amid supply chain issues.

title: Launch of Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G
description: Realme launched the Narzo 80 Pro 5G smartphone in India, featuring a 120Hz display and 80W fast charging.

title: iQOO Z10 Series Released in India
description: iQOO released its Z10 series smartphones in India, boasting high-performance specs and fast charging capabilities.

title: Discovery of Potential Biosignatures on Exoplanet K2-18b
description: Scientists detected compounds in the atmosphere of exoplanet K2-18b that may indicate biological activity.

title: World's Smallest Biodegradable Pacemaker Demonstrated
description: A 3.5mm biodegradable pacemaker was demonstrated, capable of being injected and dissolving after use.

title: Laser-Based Photonic Cooling System Announced
description: A new laser-based photonic cooling system for computer chips was announced, aiming to reduce energy use by up to 40%.

title: SpaceX's Fram2 Enters Polar Retrograde Orbit
description: SpaceX's Fram2 became the first crewed spaceflight to enter a polar retrograde orbit.

title: Boat Capsizes in Congo River
description: A motorized wooden boat capsized after catching fire in the Congo River, killing at least 148 people.

title: Expo 2025 Opens in Osaka, Japan
description: Expo 2025 commenced in Osaka, Japan, showcasing global innovations and cultural exhibits.

title: Ecuadorian President Daniel Noboa Re-elected
description: Daniel Noboa was re-elected as President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election.

title: Hungary Withdraws from International Criminal Court
description: Hungary withdrew from the ICC following a state visit by Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu.

title: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol Impeached
description: South Korea's Constitutional Court upheld the impeachment of President Yoon Suk Yeol, removing him from office.

title: Nightclub Roof Collapse in Santo Domingo
description: A nightclub roof collapsed during a concert in Santo Domingo, killing at least 231 people.

title: Illegal Fireworks Factory Explosion in Gujarat
description: An explosion at an illegal fireworks factory in Deesa, Gujarat, resulted in 21 fatalities.
